Package artemislite

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    represents an actor in the system
    ComparePosition
    Comparator class to sort squares by their position
    CompareWinners
    Comparator class to sort winners at the end of the game
    Game
    Represents the game , including setup of players and board, rolling dice, player movement on board, options menu functionality, purchasing/developing/auctioning squares and updating resources
    Player
    represents a player in the system
    Question
    Represents a question within the game
    Quiz
    Contains methods relating to the quiz functionality of the game
    SetupGame
    Methods for creating squares and players in order to set up the game
    Square
    represents a square on the board
    SystemSquare
    represents a square on the board that belongs to a system
    Triplet<A,B,C>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SystemName
    the valid system names
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BankruptcyException
    custom BankruptcyException, thrown when player goes bankrupt
    DuplicateNameException
    custom DuplicateNameException, thrown when player enters a duplicate name
